effect.@en: After successfully casting, you remove an Ailment or other sickness from a threat, person or plant. It is then contained as a black liquid inside the receptacle. If the receptacle is opened, it can be released upon a threat, person or plant it is poured upon as they are infected with the Ailment.

criticalSuccess.@en: It also restores any lost Damage, Peril and temporary Primary Attribute penalties lost due to the Ailment.

criticalFailure.@en: You now suffer from the Ailment.

reagents.@en: A glass or metal receptacle with a closing lid
